licence_overview:
Your business must be licensed by the [Department of Agriculture and Rural Development](http://www.dardni.gov.uk "Department of Agriculture and Rural Development"){:rel="external"} if you possess specified animal pathogens or carriers of such pathogens.

Licences will be in writing and there are strict conditions attached to a licence with which businesses must comply.
licence_short_description: A licence to possess specified animal pathogens or carriers is issued by the Department of Agriculture and Rural Development.
overview: You need a licence to have specified animal pathogens or carriers in Northern Ireland
title: Licence to possess specified animal pathogens or carriers (Northern Ireland)
will_continue_on: the Department of Agriculture and Rural Development website
